channel.title: Just need to get this off
channel.description:
Okay so a lot of people have been msning me asking why I "quit" rsps. I know this probably is against the rules or whatever but I feel I do deserve I need to tell the truth of why I "left" rsps.
As you know Myth-Scape closed down in early January. The main reason of this was Jack(meeper) was infecting his players with RAT. The ONLY reason why he knew how was because of me. I honestly didn't think he would be that selfish and self centered. He had asked me like a month before that how you go about doing it. I never gave him the full details but I gave him the main jist of what was needed.
I don't know why I am telling everybody this but it just has been clawing at my insides for the past week and I felt you guys should know. If this deserves me getting banned...so be it but I just had to let it out lol.
-Love <3
p.s. this is no where near a "good bye" statement I will still be here if you guys still accept me but I just felt I should let you guys know considering I have had a good 10-15 people ask me. I also apologize for lying stating I was just "bored"

@davidi2 wrote:

meeper got banned ages ago for this

item.title: Just need to get this off
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:432239”][quote author=t4 link=topic=534950.msg3910937#msg3910937 date=1328734730]

Yeah, you’ll most likely get banned.

unless he actively participated, no.
[/quote]I never participated. As soon as I found out what he did I found out what was needed to get rid of it, and mass emailed everyone with instructions. I also told them to NOT download the cache nor to go on the site as he had added a logger of some kind on there as well.[/quote]
okay so you’re not guilty of anything, end of story.

Read full topic
item.source: Just need to get this off

item.title: Just need to get this off
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:5, topic:432239”]Sharing knowledge of something isn’t bad, but the person abusing that knowledge is. You really can’t be held accountable for this. If he really wanted to RAT people, he would’ve learned eventually, all you did was speed it up a bit for him.[/quote]I don’t know I just feel accountable though. I worked with the guy for over six months. I wouldn’t help explain what to do for something like that unless I majorly trusted the person. Myth-Scape was a very profitable project for the both of us but I just feel like I did something bad.

Read full topic
item.source: Just need to get this off

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Sharing knowledge of something isn’t bad, but the person abusing that knowledge is. You really can’t be held accountable for this. If he really wanted to RAT people, he would’ve learned eventually, all you did was speed it up a bit for him.
